title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.001
frontText: What is it about large cloud providers like AWS that makes it possible for deployments using their infrastructure to be more secure than many alternatives?
backText: AWS has the money and expertise to achieve security best practices.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.002
frontText: What is it about the payment model used by major cloud providers that contributes to their efficiency and effectiveness?
backText: The self‐service, pay‐per‐use payment model allows for a high level of automation.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.003
frontText: True/False: The infrastructure‐as‐a‐service (IaaS) cloud service model provides customers with the highest control over their resources of all cloud models.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.004
frontText: True/False: Platform‐as‐a‐service (PaaS) services provide users with only minimal control over their applications.
backText: False. PaaS services (like Elastic Beanstalk) do simplify infrastructure administration, but they still offer significant control over the application environment.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.005
frontText: Which server virtualization model shares the host kernel among the virtual client servers?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.006
frontText: What word describes the ability to automatically add compute resources to an application to meet changing user demand?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.007
frontText: True/False: Function‐based services like Amazon's Lambda operate without servers.
backText: False. Even though Lambda and similar services are described as “serverless,” the servers running their code are simply “hidden” from the customer view.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.008
frontText: What are the two primary elements that allow cloud providers like AWS to provide many low‐consumption costs for customers?
backText: Virtualized servers and enormous operational scale

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.009
frontText: For how long do owners of new AWS accounts get to enjoy the Free Tier?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.010
frontText: Which free, online AWS tool lets you accurately estimate the costs you would pay for the use of any combination of AWS resources?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.011
frontText: Which AWS service lets you consolidate the billing and administration of multiple AWS accounts?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.012
frontText: True/False: AWS services can be consumed by customers at any rate and volume.
backText: False. There are default limits to the volume of service resources consumed by customers.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.013
frontText: You can set up alerts that will trigger notifications when your monthly AWS costs approach a preset amount using which service?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.014
frontText: You can closely analyze the way your account resources are being consumed and how much they're costing by using which AWS service?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.015
frontText: What is the best source of accurate, up‐to‐date information on the costs of AWS services?
backText: Amazon's online documentation, where the URL will usually follow this format: aws.amazon.com/˂service‐name˃/pricing/

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.016
frontText: What benefits does the AWS Free Tier offer?
backText: Free access to lightweight versions of many core services

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.017
frontText: Which AWS service identifies insecure, inefficient, or wasteful configurations on your account?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.018
frontText: Which AWS support plans include access to the full range of Trusted Advisor checks?
backText: Accounts with either Business‐ or Enterprise‐level support subscriptions

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.019
frontText: What is the minimum monthly charge for the Enterprise support plan?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.020
frontText: How much does it cost per month for accounts subscribed to the Basic support plan?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.021
frontText: How much would Business support cost for an account that consumed $60,000 dollars in a given month?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.022
frontText: Which AWS documentation resources should you consult for in‐depth architectural and design guidance?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.023
frontText: Which of these is not a category of checks offered by AWS Trusted Advisor: Cost Optimization, Performance, Security, Fault Tolerance, or Connectivity?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.024
frontText: True/False: AWS Trusted Advisor will, if you consent, fix the account configuration problems it finds.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.025
frontText: According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, would AWS be required to reimburse the costs incurred when a hosted software application was hacked by criminals and disabled?
backText: No. Customers are responsible for the security and maintenance of their applications.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.026
frontText: According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, would AWS be responsible for the loss of S3‐hosted data due to hardware failures?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.027
frontText: According to the AWS Shared Responsibility Model, would AWS be responsible for the loss of S3‐hosted data if it was accidentally deleted?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.028
frontText: True/False: Route 53 is a global service.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.029
frontText: You know you've got an EC2 instance running, but it doesn't show up in the AWS Management Console on the EC2 page. What could the problem be?
backText: The region currently selected in the console is not the same region where your instance is running.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.030
frontText: True/False: An availability zone is two or more physical data centers located within a single geographic region.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.031
frontText: True/False: An AWS region consists of two or more availability zones that connect to each other over the public Internet.
backText: False. AZs within a single region are connected directly over a low‐latency network.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.032
frontText: True/False: The current health status of AWS services is kept secret to prevent malicious activity.
backText: False. You can always check the status of services on the AWS Service Health Dashboard.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.033
frontText: Where can you find authoritative information on the ways AWS infrastructure is compliant with various industry and regulatory standards?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.034
frontText: How does AWS describe the integration of third‐party authentication services with IAM authorization tools?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.035
frontText: What type of IAM entity is assumed by processes (rather than people) to gain authorized access to AWS resources?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.036
frontText: How can you simplify the long‐term administration of permissions for an AWS account with many users?
backText: Assign your users to groups so you only need to edit group permissions.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.037
frontText: What AWS service automates the administration of encryption for your AWS resources?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.038
frontText: True/False: You should do most of your AWS administration using the root user you were given when you created the account.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.039
frontText: Which AWS Dashboard do you use to create and manage access keys so you can administer your resources remotely?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.040
frontText: What can you enable to enhance the security of the ways your users log in to your AWS account?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.041
frontText: What is an effective way to ensure that the resources running in a busy AWS account are easy to identify and administer?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.042
frontText: What tool would an admin use to administer AWS resources from a PC or laptop if automation and efficiency are critical?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.043
frontText: What tools does AWS provide to make it easier to write code for cloud‐based applications?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.044
frontText: How can you organize multiple related running resources into a single custom dashboard within the Management Console to make it easier to visualize and access important resources?
backText: Using resource groups (through AWS Systems Manager)

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.045
frontText: What's the best AWS service to use to closely monitor account activity?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.046
frontText: What's the best AWS service to use to closely monitor the health and behavior of your cloud‐based applications?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.047
frontText: Which AWS service lets you organize, visualize, and manage your account costs?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.048
frontText: True/False: You can use the AWS Console Mobile Application to manage Simple Storage Service (S3) buckets.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.049
frontText: How does AWS describe the templates you select to launch predefined operating system and software stacks as the base for your EC2 instances?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.050
frontText: What's the most cost‐effective way to run an EC2 instance that needs to be available 24/7 for the foreseeable future?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.051
frontText: What's the most cost‐effective way to run an EC2 instance that needs to run for only a few hours for each weekday?
backText: Run an on‐demand EC2 instance only when necessary.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.052
frontText: Which AWS service offers you access to EC2 infrastructure but takes care of the provisioning invisibly, leaving you responsible only for your application code?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.053
frontText: You want your EC2 instance to run on a data volume whose contents won't be lost should you stop your instance. What kind of data volume should you choose?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.054
frontText: Some EC2 instance types come with data volumes that are physically connected to the instance's physical host. What are these volumes called?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.055
frontText: When you're provisioning an EC2 instance, which parameter controls the hardware features your instance will be given?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.056
frontText: Which two AWS services provide administration interfaces for managing large Docker clusters?
backText: Amazon Elastic Container Service (ECS—and its Fargate subset) and Amazon Elastic Container Service for Kubernetes (EKS)

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.057
frontText: True/False: Amazon's Simple Storage Service (S3) is designed primarily for storing entire filesystems in blocks.
backText: False. S3 is an object storage system. Elastic Block Storage (EBS) is the better choice for filesystems.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.058
frontText: Which of the S3‐related storage classes provides the least expensive options?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.059
frontText: How can you optimize your S3 storage costs and performance by automating the transfer of data between storage classes?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.060
frontText: Which AWS service can be the best choice for moving very large (peta‐scale) archives between your local infrastructure and an S3 bucket?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.061
frontText: Is it possible to directly connect local data archives that expect a tape backup interface with S3‐based buckets?
backText: Yes, using an AWS Storage Gateway appliance

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.062
frontText: Which S3 service class will provide greater data availability: S3 Standard‐IA or S3 One Zone‐IA?
backText: S3 Standard‐IA, offering 99.9 percent availability against 99.5 percent for S3 One Zone‐IA

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.063
frontText: What's the trade‐off for AWS S3 Glacier's very low storage costs?
backText: Data retrieval can be slow, sometimes measured in hours.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.064
frontText: True/False: Access to data in S3 buckets can be easily integrated into the workflows of many other AWS services on your account.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.065
frontText: What kind of database workloads will run on AWS RDS?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.066
frontText: Which AWS service is designed for fast and efficient NoSQL database workloads?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.067
frontText: What is a relational database engine that was created by Amazon to take full advantage of the AWS environment?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.068
frontText: True/False: Both Oracle's and Microsoft's SQL databases will run on AWS RDS.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.069
frontText: What's the best way to increase data durability for your RDS databases?
backText: Enable Multi‐AZ to replicate your data.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.070
frontText: What is Amazon Redshift?
backText: A fast and scalable data warehouse service

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.071
frontText: How is the speed by which an RDS database can access its data measured?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.072
frontText: Which RDS instance class will be most cost‐effective for nonproduction testing requirements where you don't need consistent high performance?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.073
frontText: A ________ is a block of IP addresses that are assigned for the use of instances in a virtual private cloud (VPC) availability zone.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.074
frontText: What must be defined so that instances within a virtual private cloud (VPC) can have access to external networks?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.075
frontText: What firewall‐like device can be configured at the subnet level to control network access to your instances?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.076
frontText: What firewall‐like device can be configured at the instance level to control network access?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.077
frontText: A ________ is a virtual network you define as an isolated organizing structure containing EC2 instances and other resources.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.078
frontText: Is it possible to create a fast, dedicated network connection between your local infrastructure and your AWS‐based resources?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.079
frontText: Is it possible to create direct links between multiple VPCs in a single or multiple accounts?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.080
frontText: What AWS service can be used to manage your domain name addressing and registration administration?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.081
frontText: What's a good way to create templates representing your existing AWS resources, making it easy to reproduce and relaunch resource stacks?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.082
frontText: What AWS tool can automate the provisioning and launching of new resources to meet growing user demand?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.083
frontText: Which top‐level category of AWS services (as organized in the Management Console) can, as a group, form an important part of your organization's DevOps process?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.084
frontText: What is AWS CodeCommit?
backText: A Git‐compatible software code repository that's integrated with other AWS services

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.085
frontText: What AWS service can be used to automate the process of building and testing your source code?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.086
frontText: Which AWS service can be used to design and automate the steps required to handle application code releases from start to deployment?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.087
frontText: What, in terms of AWS deployments, is a “multitiered” environment?
backText: Any deployment that includes multiple classes of resources. Combining front‐end EC2 web servers, an RDS database instance, and an Elastic Load Balancer would be a common example.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.088
frontText: What is Amazon Elastic File System (EFS)?
backText: A managed service allowing you to share filesystem objects between EC2 instances across your AWS account and, through AWS Direct Connect or AWS VPN connections, with on‐premises infrastructure

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.089
frontText: ________ can help you improve application performance through in‐memory data caches.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.090
frontText: What AWS service lets you use SQL queries to analyze data stored in S3 buckets?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.091
frontText: What is the function of Amazon Kinesis?
backText: Capturing and analyzing very large volumes of data streaming generated by multiple log, transaction, and social media sources

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.092
frontText: Which AWS service lets you set a desired account‐wide configuration profile and regularly audit your account settings to ensure you're in compliance?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.093
frontText: What is AWS System Manager?
backText: A single, unified interface through which you can monitor and automate the administration of resources running in multiple AWS services account‐wide

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.094
frontText: _______________ is a scalable service that converts media files to formats that better fit your application's target usage.

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.095
frontText: What is Amazon Machine Learning (Amazon ML)?
backText: A set of visualization tools and wizards designed to guide users through the creation of machine learning models

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.096
frontText: How can you efficiently run big data frameworks like Apache Spark, Hadoop, and Hive within your AWS resources?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.097
frontText: What is Amazon Cognito?
backText: A tool for directly managing user sign‐up and sign‐in for your website or mobile apps

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.098
frontText: Is it possible to host remote Windows or Linux desktops for your organization's users using AWS?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.099
frontText: What AWS service can you use to manage your enterprise email operations?

title: fc235636.AWS.CCP.SG2E.100
frontText: _______ can be used to manage both programmatic and human‐readable communications between AWS service resources and humans.
